page.title: 17Playground Games
page.content: Our games all involve lots of children. Some use rhymes, balls, skipping ropes,long pieces of elastic or whatever else is in the playground. 45 home is like hide and seek.One child is called a seeker and a few others are hiders.The seeker closes her eyes and counts to 45 while the others all hide.When the seeker has counted to 45 she shouts,"Coming, Ready or Not".If the seeker sees you, you both run to the post.If the seeker gets there first she says,"45"and the hiders name.If the hider gets there first she says,"45 home".If all the other hiders except one get caught the last one runs to the post and says, "45 home,save all"and the seeker stays seeker for the next game.If the last one is caught the first one that was caught becomes the new seeker.
